languages.text: "Если б в этом ящике валялся я — он бы тоже по мне не горевал", {n}— неожиданно едко цедит Кас. Потом успокаивается.{/n} "Сыновьи чувства — дело сложное. Я не был хорошим сыном, старина Денз не был хорошим отцом. Но я по нему по-своему скучаю, да. Он мне всегда казался вечным, не мешком мяса и дурных амбиций, как все мы".

"If I was the one lying in that box, he wouldn't be crying his eyes out either," {n}Kas bites out with sudden acidity. He takes a moment to calm himself.{/n} "A son's feelings are complicated. I wasn't a good son; old Denz wasn't a good father. But I do miss him in my own way, yes. He always seemed timeless to me, not just a bag of meat and ugly ambitions like the rest of us are."
languages.original_text: "Если б в этом ящике валялся я — он бы тоже по мне не горевал", {n}— неожиданно едко цедит Кас. Потом успокаивается.{/n} "Сыновьи чувства — дело сложное. Я не был хорошим сыном, старина Денз не был хорошим отцом. Но я по нему по-своему скучаю, да. Он мне всегда казался вечным, не мешком мяса и дурных амбиций, как все мы".

traits.locale_text: "If I were lying in that box right now, he wouldn't be stricken either," {n}Kas mutters with sudden acidity. Then he settles down.{/n} "A son's feelings are complicated. I wasn't a good son, old Denz wasn't a good father. But I do miss him in my own way, yes. He always seemed timeless to me, not just a bag of meat and ugly ambitions like the rest of us are."
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

He takes a moment to calm himself.{/n} "A son's feelings are complicated. I wasn't a good son; old Denz wasn't a good father. But I do miss him in my own way, yes. He always seemed timeless to me, not just a bag of meat and ugly ambitions like the rest of us are."
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

languages.text: “如果躺在那个匣子里的人是我，他恐怕也不会流一滴眼泪。”{n}卡斯突然咬牙切齿地说出了这句话。他花了些时间，才让自己平静下来。{/n}“儿子对父亲的感情总是很复杂。我不是什么好儿子，老丹兹也不是什么好父亲。不过，哎，我确实会以我自己的方式怀念他。在我看来，他就像是个不朽的传奇。不像我们剩下的人，不过是一群各怀鬼胎的酒囊饭袋。”
languages.original_text: "If I was the one lying in that box, he wouldn't be crying his eyes out either," {n}Kas bites out with sudden acidity. He takes a moment to calm himself.{/n} "A son's feelings are complicated. I wasn't a good son; old Denz wasn't a good father. But I do miss him in my own way, yes. He always seemed timeless to me, not just a bag of meat and ugly ambitions like the rest of us are."

traits.locale_text: “如果躺在那个匣子里的人是我，他恐怕也不会流一滴眼泪。”{n}卡斯突然咬牙切齿地说出了这句话。他花了些时间，才让自己平静下来。{/n}“儿子对父亲的感情总是很复杂。我不是什么好儿子，老丹兹也不是什么好父亲。不过，哎，我确实会以我自己的方式怀念他。在我看来，他就像是个不朽的传奇。不像我们剩下的人，不过是一群各怀鬼胎的酒囊饭袋。”
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

languages.text: «Si fuera yo el que está en esa caja, él tampoco lloraría». {n}Escupe Kas con una mordacidad repentina. Espera un momento para calmarse.{/n} «Los sentimientos de un hijo son complicados. Yo no he sido un buen hijo y el viejo Denz no ha sido un buen padre, pero le echo de menos a mi manera, sí. Siempre me pareció que era eterno; algo más que un saco de carne y ambiciones vergonzosas como el resto de nosotros».
languages.original_text: "If I was the one lying in that box, he wouldn't be crying his eyes out either," {n}Kas bites out with sudden acidity. He takes a moment to calm himself.{/n} "A son's feelings are complicated. I wasn't a good son; old Denz wasn't a good father. But I do miss him in my own way, yes. He always seemed timeless to me, not just a bag of meat and ugly ambitions like the rest of us are."

traits.locale_text: «Si fuera yo el que está en esa caja, él tampoco lloraría». {n}Escupe Kas con una mordacidad repentina. Espera un momento para calmarse.{/n} «Los sentimientos de un hijo son complicados. Yo no he sido un buen hijo y el viejo Denz no ha sido un buen padre, pero le echo de menos a mi manera, sí. Siempre me pareció que era eterno; algo más que un saco de carne y ambiciones vergonzosas como el resto de nosotros».
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

languages.text: 「あの棺桶にいるのが俺であっても、親父は泣かないだろうね」{n}キャスは突然、苦々しく吐き捨てた。冷静さを取り戻すために一呼吸置いた。{/n}「息子の気持ちも複雑なもんだよ。俺は良い息子じゃなかったし、デンツも良い父親とはほど遠かった。だけど、俺なりに親父を偲んでるんだぜ。俺たちみたいにきたねぇ野望を持った有象無象と違って、親父はいつだって輝いて見えた」
languages.original_text: "If I was the one lying in that box, he wouldn't be crying his eyes out either," {n}Kas bites out with sudden acidity. He takes a moment to calm himself.{/n} "A son's feelings are complicated. I wasn't a good son; old Denz wasn't a good father. But I do miss him in my own way, yes. He always seemed timeless to me, not just a bag of meat and ugly ambitions like the rest of us are."

traits.locale_text: 「あの棺桶にいるのが俺であっても、親父は泣かないだろうね」{n}キャスは突然、苦々しく吐き捨てた。冷静さを取り戻すために一呼吸置いた。{/n}「息子の気持ちも複雑なもんだよ。俺は良い息子じゃなかったし、デンツも良い父親とはほど遠かった。だけど、俺なりに親父を偲んでるんだぜ。俺たちみたいにきたねぇ野望を持った有象無象と違って、親父はいつだって輝いて見えた」
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

languages.text: "Läge ich jetzt in dieser Kiste, würde er sich auch nicht die Augen ausheulen", {n}stößt Kas verbittert hervor. Er hält kurz inne, um sich zu beruhigen.{/n} "Die Gefühle eines Sohnes sind kompliziert. Ich war kein guter Sohn, der alte Denz war kein guter Vater. Aber auf meine Art vermisse ich ihn durchaus. Er schien für mich immer außerhalb der Zeit zu stehen, war nicht bloß ein Sack aus Fleisch und hässlichem Ehrgeiz wie der Rest von uns."
languages.original_text: "If I was the one lying in that box, he wouldn't be crying his eyes out either," {n}Kas bites out with sudden acidity. He takes a moment to calm himself.{/n} "A son's feelings are complicated. I wasn't a good son; old Denz wasn't a good father. But I do miss him in my own way, yes. He always seemed timeless to me, not just a bag of meat and ugly ambitions like the rest of us are."

traits.locale_text: "Läge ich jetzt in dieser Kiste, würde er sich auch nicht die Augen ausheulen", {n}stößt Kas verbittert hervor. Er hält kurz inne, um sich zu beruhigen.{/n} "Die Gefühle eines Sohnes sind kompliziert. Ich war kein guter Sohn, der alte Denz war kein guter Vater. Aber auf meine Art vermisse ich ihn durchaus. Er schien für mich immer außerhalb der Zeit zu stehen, war nicht bloß ein Sack aus Fleisch und hässlichem Ehrgeiz wie der Rest von uns."
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

languages.text: « Si c'était moi dans ce cercueil, il ne verserait pas une larme non plus, » {n}rétorque Kas sur un ton acide avant de prendre un instant pour se calmer.{/n} « Les sentiments d'un fils sont toujours compliqués. Je n'ai jamais été un bon fils et Denz n'a jamais été un bon père, mais il me manque, d'une certaine façon. Il avait toujours été intemporel à mes yeux, ce n'était pas qu'un sac de viande hideux guidé par l'ambition comme nous autres. »
languages.original_text: "If I was the one lying in that box, he wouldn't be crying his eyes out either," {n}Kas bites out with sudden acidity. He takes a moment to calm himself.{/n} "A son's feelings are complicated. I wasn't a good son; old Denz wasn't a good father. But I do miss him in my own way, yes. He always seemed timeless to me, not just a bag of meat and ugly ambitions like the rest of us are."

traits.locale_text: « Si c'était moi dans ce cercueil, il ne verserait pas une larme non plus, » {n}rétorque Kas sur un ton acide avant de prendre un instant pour se calmer.{/n} « Les sentiments d'un fils sont toujours compliqués. Je n'ai jamais été un bon fils et Denz n'a jamais été un bon père, mais il me manque, d'une certaine façon. Il avait toujours été intemporel à mes yeux, ce n'était pas qu'un sac de viande hideux guidé par l'ambition comme nous autres. »
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion

languages.text: "O kutuda yatan ben olsaydım o da hüngür hüngür ağlamazdı." {n}Bir anda parlayan Kas, biraz durup sakinliyor.{/n} "Evlatların duyguları karmaşıktır. Ne ben iyi bir oğuldum, ne de o iyi bir baba. Kendimce onu özlüyorum tabii. Bana hiç ölmeyecekmiş gibi gelirdi. Geri kalanımız gibi et ve pis hırslar yığınından ibaret değildi sadece."
languages.original_text: "If I was the one lying in that box, he wouldn't be crying his eyes out either," {n}Kas bites out with sudden acidity. He takes a moment to calm himself.{/n} "A son's feelings are complicated. I wasn't a good son; old Denz wasn't a good father. But I do miss him in my own way, yes. He always seemed timeless to me, not just a bag of meat and ugly ambitions like the rest of us are."

traits.locale_text: "O kutunun içinde yatan ben olsaydım o da gözyaşlarına boğulmazdı." {n}Kas sert bir şekilde aniden parlıyor. Sakinleşmek için biraz duruyor.{/n} "Çocukların hislerini anlamak zordur. Ben ona iyi bir oğul olamadım, Denz de bana iyi bir baba olamadı. Kendimce onu özlüyorum tabii. Bana her zaman zamansız biriymiş gibi gelirdi, diğerleri gibi et ve çirkin hevesler yığınından ibaret değildi."
traits.speaker: SideQuestPirateScion
